title: My Thoughts on Pre-Season Patch
body:
Now any significant changes are going to get a lot of resistance, that's always the case.
But there's normally a few white knights supporting the new flow of things.

When was the last time you saw a post that was along the lines of "good job Rito, I like the new changes"?

Everyone seems to hate this new stuff, the whole BE/IP thing is widely condemned as trash, and the new rune system seems to favour a few champs at the expense of others.

It's totally narrowing the field of competitive champs, not widening it.
When you can literally get 100-0 nuked in 0.2 seconds, without CC, something is wrong.

I have bought RP in the past, on many occasions (been playing since season 2), but until this game gets balanced again, I wouldn't even consider spending a cent.
I ask everyone that is unhappy with the current state of the game to not buy or spend RP until they sort this shit out.
